contract_transaction_vendor_facet_data.source:
SELECT CASE WHEN prime_sub_vendor_code_by_type ~* '(.*P:*.)|(.*PM:*.)' THEN prime_vendor_code END as vendor_code, prime_vendor_name as vendor_name, * FROM all_agreement_transactions_by_prime_vendor
                      UNION ALL
                      SELECT CASE WHEN prime_sub_vendor_code_by_type ~* '(.*S:*.)|(.*SM:*.)' THEN sub_vendor_code END as vendor_code, sub_vendor_name as vendor_name, * FROM all_agreement_transactions_by_prime_vendor

contract_transaction_vendor_type_facet_d.source:
SELECT 'PRIME VENDOR' vendor_type, 'P' as vendor_type_id, prime_vendor_code as vendor_code, * FROM all_agreement_transactions_by_prime_vendor WHERE prime_sub_vendor_code_by_type ~* '(^P:.*$)|(.*,P:.*$)|(^P:.*,.*)|(^PM:.*$)|(.*,PM:.*$)|(^PM:.*,.*)'
                      UNION ALL
                      SELECT 'SUB VENDOR' as vendor_type, 'S' as vendor_type_id, sub_vendor_code as vendor_code, * FROM all_agreement_transactions_by_prime_vendor WHERE prime_sub_vendor_code_by_type ~* '(^S:.*$)|(.*,S:.*$)|(^S:.*,.*)|(^SM:.*$)|(.*,SM:.*$)|(^SM:.*,.*)'
                      UNION ALL
                      SELECT 'M/WBE VENDOR' vendor_type, 'M' as vendor_type_id, prime_vendor_code as vendor_code, * FROM all_agreement_transactions_by_prime_vendor WHERE prime_sub_vendor_code_by_type ~* '(^PM:.*$)|(.*,PM:.*$)|(^PM:.*,.*)'
                      UNION ALL
                      SELECT 'M/WBE VENDOR' as vendor_type, 'M' as vendor_type_id, sub_vendor_code as vendor_code, * FROM all_agreement_transactions_by_prime_vendor WHERE prime_sub_vendor_code_by_type ~* '(^SM:.*$)|(.*,SM:.*$)|(^SM:.*,.*)'

contract_transaction_minority_type_facet.source:
SELECT CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id IN (4,5) THEN '4~5' ELSE CAST(prime_minority_type_id as text) END AS minority_type_id, prime_minority_type_name as minority_type_name, prime_vendor_code as vendor_code, * FROM all_agreement_transactions_by_prime_vendor
                      UNION ALL
                      SELECT CASE WHEN sub_minority_type_id IN (4,5) THEN '4~5' ELSE CAST(sub_minority_type_id as text) END AS minority_type_id, sub_minority_type_name as minority_type_name, sub_vendor_code as vendor_code, * FROM all_agreement_transactions_by_prime_vendor
